;;;112    static void content_input_save(void)
0001ae  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
;;;113    {
;;;114    	if(holder.contentList[holder.curSelectId -1].inputContent == CONTENT_VMID)//机器号输入

0001b2  6881              LDR      r1,[r0,#8]  ; holder
0001b4  7b00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xc]  ; holder

;;;115    	{
;;;116    		
;;;117    		if(input_len_get() == 10 &&  input_char_get()[0]< '4')//要求10位输入并且首位需要小于4

0001cc  d130              BNE      |L1.560|
0001ce  f7fffffe          BL       input_char_get

;;;118    		{
;;;119    			if(mac_data->facId != input_value_get())

;;;122    				input_char_get()[input_len_get()] = 0; //末尾字符归零(这里比较特殊，因为要求是固定长度)
0001f0  f7fffffe          BL       input_char_get

;;;123    				strcpy(holder.contentList[holder.curSelectId-1].val, input_char_get());

000222  f7fffffe          BL       e2p_set_vminfo

;;;127    			}

0002a2  485a              LDR      r0,|L1.1036|

;;;147    				//不需要汇报
;;;148    			}
;;;149    			lcd_show_character(&pt_word.warring[0]);//设置成功
0002aa  4957              LDR      r1,|L1.1032|
0002ac  6988              LDR      r0,[r1,#0x18]  ; pt_word

;;;156    	else
;;;157    	if(holder.contentList[holder.curSelectId -1].inputContent == CONTENT_LINKENABLE)//连网使能输入

000868  49ec              LDR      r1,|L1.3100|
00086a  6988              LDR      r0,[r1,#0x18]  ; pt_word
00086c  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_character
;;;360    				transfer_value_to_time(input_value_get(), holder.contentList[holder.curSelectId -1].val);
000870  f7fffffe          BL       input_value_get
000874  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000876  48e7              LDR      r0,|L1.3092|
000878  6882              LDR      r2,[r0,#8]  ; holder
00087a  7b00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xc]  ; holder
00087c  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00087e  ebc000c0          RSB      r0,r0,r0,LSL #3
000882  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
000886  f1000108          ADD      r1,r0,#8
00088a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00088c  f7fffffe          BL       transfer_value_to_time
000890  e00c              B        |L1.2220|
                  |L1.2194|
;;;361    			}
;;;362    			else
;;;363    			{
;;;364    				lcd_show_character(&pt_word.warring[1]);//"设置失败"
000892  49e2              LDR      r1,|L1.3100|
000894  6989              LDR      r1,[r1,#0x18]  ; pt_word
000896  f1010014          ADD      r0,r1,#0x14
00089a  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_character
00089e  e005              B        |L1.2220|
                  |L1.2208|
;;;365    			}
;;;366    		}
;;;367    		else
;;;368    		{
;;;369    			lcd_show_character(&pt_word.warring[1]);//"设置失败"
0008a0  49de              LDR      r1,|L1.3100|
0008a2  6989              LDR      r1,[r1,#0x18]  ; pt_word
0008a4  f1010014          ADD      r0,r1,#0x14
0008a8  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_character
                  |L1.2220|
;;;370    		}
;;;371    	}
;;;372    }
0008ac  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;373    
                          ENDP

                  content_value_read PROC
;;;376    */
;;;377    static void content_value_read(void)
0008ae  b508              PUSH     {r3,lr}
;;;378    {
;;;379    	uint8_t err;
;;;380    	
;;;381    	//分配空间
;;;382    //	mac_data = 0;//因为_malloc总会返回值，所以这里不需要初始化指针
;;;383    	mac_data = _malloc(sizeof(SETUP_DEVICE), &err);
0008b0  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0008b2  200c              MOVS     r0,#0xc
0008b4  f7fffffe          BL       _malloc
0008b8  49d9              LDR      r1,|L1.3104|
0008ba  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mac_data
;;;384    	assert_param(mac_data);
;;;385    	
;;;386    //	vm_common = 0;
;;;387    	vm_common = _malloc(sizeof(SETUP_COMMON), &err);
0008bc  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0008be  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
0008c0  f7fffffe          BL       _malloc
0008c4  49d7              LDR      r1,|L1.3108|
0008c6  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; vm_common
;;;388    	assert_param(vm_common);
;;;389    	
;;;390    //	comucation = 0;
;;;391    	comucation = _malloc(sizeof(SETUP_COMMUCATION), &err);
0008c8  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0008ca  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
0008cc  f7fffffe          BL       _malloc
0008d0  49d5              LDR      r1,|L1.3112|
0008d2  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; comucation
;;;392    	assert_param(comucation);
;;;393    	
;;;394    //	content = 0;
;;;395    	content = _malloc(sizeof(AGGREGATE), &err); 
0008d4  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0008d6  f44f70c4          MOV      r0,#0x188
0008da  f7fffffe          BL       _malloc
0008de  49d3              LDR      r1,|L1.3116|
0008e0  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; content
;;;396    	assert_param(content);
;;;397    	
;;;398    	
;;;399    	//读取数据
;;;400    	e2p_get_common(vm_common);
0008e2  48d0              LDR      r0,|L1.3108|
0008e4  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; vm_common
0008e6  f7fffffe          BL       e2p_get_common
;;;401    	e2p_get_vminfo(mac_data);
0008ea  48cd              LDR      r0,|L1.3104|
0008ec  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mac_data
0008ee  f7fffffe          BL       e2p_get_vminfo
;;;402    	e2p_get_commucation(comucation);
0008f2  48cd              LDR      r0,|L1.3112|
0008f4  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; comucation
0008f6  f7fffffe          BL       e2p_get_commucation
;;;403    	
;;;404    	
;;;405    }
0008fa  bd08              POP      {r3,pc}
;;;406    
                          ENDP

                  content_creat PROC
;;;409    */
;;;410    static void content_creat(void)
0008fc  b50e              PUSH     {r1-r3,lr}
;;;411    {	
;;;412    	char tmp[11];tmp[10] = 0;
0008fe  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000900  f88d000a          STRB     r0,[sp,#0xa]
;;;413    	
;;;414    	content->content[0].item = &pt_word.set[18];	//"机器ID:"
000904  48c5              LDR      r0,|L1.3100|
000906  6940              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x14]  ; pt_word
000908  f50070b4          ADD      r0,r0,#0x168
00090c  49c7              LDR      r1,|L1.3116|
00090e  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; content
000910  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]
;;;415    	content->content[0].valueX = pt_word.set[18].valx;content->content[0].valueY = pt_word.set[18].valy;

000914  6940              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x14]  ; pt_word
000916  f8b00178          LDRH     r0,[r0,#0x178]
00091a  49c4              LDR      r1,|L1.3116|
00091c  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; content
00091e  8088              STRH     r0,[r1,#4]
000920  48be              LDR      r0,|L1.3100|
000922  6940              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x14]  ; pt_word
000924  f8b0017a          LDRH     r0,[r0,#0x17a]

00092a  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; content
00092c  80c8              STRH     r0,[r1,#6]
;;;416    	sprintf(tmp, "%010u", mac_data->facId);

000930  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mac_data
000932  a1bf              ADR      r1,|L1.3120|
000934  6802              LDR      r2,[r0,#0]

000938  f7fffffe          BL       __2sprintf
;;;417    	strcpy(content->content[0].val, tmp);

;;;420

000cec  7992              LDRB     r2,[r2,#6]  ; calendar

000cf2  eb031202          ADD      r2,r3,r2,LSL #4
000cf6  eb010182          ADD      r1,r1,r2,LSL #2
000cfa  4ad3              LDR      r2,|L1.4168|
000cfc  79d2              LDRB     r2,[r2,#7]  ; calendar

000d00  49cf              LDR      r1,|L1.4160|
000d02  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; content
000d04  f5017190          ADD      r1,r1,#0x120
000d08  f7fffffe          BL       transfer_value_to_data
;;;482    	
;;;483    	content->content[11].item = &pt_word.set[61];	//"时间"

000d40  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; content
000d42  f8801149          STRB     r1,[r0,#0x149]
;;;486    	transfer_value_to_time(calendar.hour*100 + calendar.min, content->content[11].val);
000d46  49c0              LDR      r1,|L1.4168|

000d4a  4abf              LDR      r2,|L1.4168|
000d4c  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]  ; calendar
000d4e  eb0203c2          ADD      r3,r2,r2,LSL #3
000d52  eb031202          ADD      r2,r3,r2,LSL #4
000d56  eb010082          ADD      r0,r1,r2,LSL #2
000d5a  49b9              LDR      r1,|L1.4160|
000d5c  6809              LDR      r1,[r1,#0]  ; content
000d5e  f501719e          ADD      r1,r1,#0x13c
000d62  f7fffffe          BL       transfer_value_to_time
;;;487    	
;;;488    	//菜单配置
;;;489    	holder.size = HOLDER_SIZE;				//容器大小
000d66  200e              MOVS     r0,#0xe
000d68  49b8              LDR      r1,|L1.4172|
000d6a  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;490    	holder.font = G_HOLDER_FONT; 				//容器字体
000d6c  48b8              LDR      r0,|L1.4176|
000d6e  6188              STR      r0,[r1,#0x18]  ; holder
;;;491    	holder.shownumPage = G_HOLDER_ITEM_SIZE;	//一页显示多少个内容
000d70  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000d72  7348              STRB     r0,[r1,#0xd]
;;;492    	holder.zicolor = G_HOLDER_CUR_ZI_COLOR;	//当前选项数字颜色
000d74  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000d76  81c8              STRH     r0,[r1,#0xe]
;;;493    	holder.numcolor = G_HOLDER_CUR_NAME_COLOR;//当前选项名称颜色
000d78  f64f70ff          MOV      r0,#0xffff
000d7c  8208              STRH     r0,[r1,#0x10]
;;;494    	holder.foreground = G_HOLDER_FOREGROUND;	//前景色
000d7e  8288              STRH     r0,[r1,#0x14]
;;;495    	holder.background = G_HOLDER_BACKGROUND;	//背景色
000d80  201f              MOVS     r0,#0x1f
000d82  8248              STRH     r0,[r1,#0x12]
;;;496    	holder.contentList = content->content;	//内容指针
000d84  48ae              LDR      r0,|L1.4160|
000d86  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; content
000d88  6088              STR      r0,[r1,#8]  ; holder
;;;497    	contant_load(&holder);
000d8a  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000d8c  f7fffffe          BL       contant_load
;;;498    	
;;;499    	content_input_set();//输入默认长度
000d90  f7fffffe          BL       content_input_set
;;;500    }
000d94  bd0e              POP      {r1-r3,pc}
;;;501    
                          ENDP

                  content_free PROC
;;;506    */
;;;507    static void content_free(void)
000d96  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;508    {
;;;509    	_free(mac_data);
000d98  48ae              LDR      r0,|L1.4180|
000d9a  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; mac_data
000d9c  f7fffffe          BL       _free
;;;510    	_free(vm_common);
000da0  48ad              LDR      r0,|L1.4184|
000da2  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; vm_common
000da4  f7fffffe          BL       _free
;;;511    	_free(comucation);
000da8  48ac              LDR      r0,|L1.4188|
000daa  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; comucation
000dac  f7fffffe          BL       _free
;;;512    	_free(content);
000db0  48a3              LDR      r0,|L1.4160|
000db2  6800              LDR      r0,[r0,#0]  ; content
000db4  f7fffffe          BL       _free
;;;513    }
000db8  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;514    /*
                          ENDP

                  pointer_init PROC
;;;517    */
;;;518    static void pointer_init(void)
000dba  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;519    {
;;;520    	mac_data = 0;
000dbc  49a5              LDR      r1,|L1.4180|
000dbe  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; mac_data
;;;521    	vm_common = 0;
000dc0  49a5              LDR      r1,|L1.4184|
000dc2  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; vm_common
;;;522    	comucation = 0;
000dc4  49a5              LDR      r1,|L1.4188|
000dc6  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; comucation
;;;523    	content = 0;
000dc8  499d              LDR      r1,|L1.4160|
000dca  6008              STR      r0,[r1,#0]  ; content
;;;524    }
000dcc  4770              BX       lr
;;;525    
                          ENDP

                  fsm_fun_vmSet PROC
;;;534    
;;;535    uint8_t fsm_fun_vmSet(FSMMSG* cmsg)
000dce  b57f              PUSH     {r0-r6,lr}
;;;536    {
000dd0  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;537    	switch (cmsg->type)
000dd2  7820              LDRB     r0,[r4,#0]
000dd4  b110              CBZ      r0,|L1.3548|
000dd6  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000dd8  d11d              BNE      |L1.3606|
000dda  e01d              B        |L1.3608|
                  |L1.3548|
;;;538    	{
;;;539    		case MsgSYS:
;;;540    			if(cmsg->stype == FSM_STATUS_INIT)
000ddc  7860              LDRB     r0,[r4,#1]
000dde  b998              CBNZ     r0,|L1.3592|
;;;541    			{
;;;542    				pointer_init();//防止野指针
000de0  f7fffffe          BL       pointer_init
;;;543    				input_clear();//输入控件清零
000de4  f7fffffe          BL       input_clear
;;;544    				//刷右边栏
;;;545    				LCD_CLEAR_SIDE;//刷屏
000de8  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_clear
;;;546    				
;;;547    				g_fsm.mode = PASSWORD_MODE; //0:输入密码模式；1:设置模式
000dec  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000dee  499c              LDR      r1,|L1.4192|
000df0  7008              STRB     r0,[r1,#0]
;;;548    				g_fsm.count = 0;
000df2  7088              STRB     r0,[r1,#2]
;;;549    				input_len_set(9);//9位密码
000df4  2009              MOVS     r0,#9
000df6  f7fffffe          BL       input_len_set
;;;550    				lcd_show_character(&pt_word.drvset[15]);//“请输入密码”
000dfa  4992              LDR      r1,|L1.4164|
000dfc  6a09              LDR      r1,[r1,#0x20]  ; pt_word
000dfe  f5017096          ADD      r0,r1,#0x12c
000e02  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_show_character
000e06  e006              B        |L1.3606|
                  |L1.3592|
;;;551    				
;;;552    //				input_clear();//输入控件清零
;;;553    //				//刷右边栏
;;;554    //				LCD_CLEAR_SIDE;//刷屏
;;;555    //				content_value_read();
;;;556    //				//显示内容
;;;557    //				content_creat();
;;;558    			}
;;;559    			else
;;;560    			if(cmsg->stype == FSM_STATUS_EXIT)
000e08  7860              LDRB     r0,[r4,#1]
000e0a  2802              CMP      r0,#2
000e0c  d103              BNE      |L1.3606|
;;;561    			{
;;;562    				content_free();
000e0e  f7fffffe          BL       content_free
;;;563    				input_clear();//输入控件清零
000e12  f7fffffe          BL       input_clear
                  |L1.3606|
;;;564    			}
;;;565    		break;
000e16  e1f9              B        |L1.4620|
                  |L1.3608|
;;;566    		
;;;567    		case MsgKEY:
;;;568    			if(cmsg->value == '*')
000e18  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]
000e1a  282a              CMP      r0,#0x2a
000e1c  d103              BNE      |L1.3622|
;;;569    			{
;;;570    				Load_status(fsm_id_seniorMenu);
000e1e  2008              MOVS     r0,#8
000e20  f7fffffe          BL       Load_status
                  |L1.3620|
000e24  e1f1              B        |L1.4618|
                  |L1.3622|
;;;571    			}
;;;572    			else
;;;573    			{
;;;574    				//参数设置模式
;;;575    				if(g_fsm.mode == SET_MODE)

000e2a  2801              CMP      r0,#1
000e2c  d17e              BNE      |L1.3884|
;;;576    				{
;;;577    					lcd_clear_character(&pt_word.warring[0]);//清除下边提示
000e2e  4985              LDR      r1,|L1.4164|
000e30  6988              LDR      r0,[r1,#0x18]  ; pt_word
000e32  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_clear_character
;;;578    					if(cmsg->value == DOOR_CLOSE_VAL)
000e36  6860              LDR      r0,[r4,#4]
000e38  286a              CMP      r0,#0x6a

;;;579    					{
;;;580    						Load_status(fsm_id_init);

000e3e  f7fffffe          BL       Load_status
000e42  e1e2              B        |L1.4618|
                  |L1.3652|
;;;581    					}
;;;582    					else 
;;;583    					if(cmsg->value == KEY_DOWN_VAL)//下翻

000e46  286d              CMP      r0,#0x6d
000e48  d107              BNE      |L1.3674|
;;;584    					{
;;;585    						content_page_down(&holder);

;;;586    						input_clear();

;;;587    						content_input_set();

                  |L1.3674|
;;;588    					}
;;;589    					else
;;;590    					if(cmsg->value == KEY_UP_VAL)//上翻

000e5e  d107              BNE      |L1.3696|
;;;591    					{
;;;592    						content_page_up(&holder);

;;;593    						input_clear();

;;;594    						content_input_set();

;;;595    					}
;;;596    					else
;;;597    					if(cmsg->value == '#')//数据保存

;;;634    								e2p_reset_all();	//恢复 E2PROM

;;;638    								content_creat();	//重新载入设置数据

                  |L1.4160|

                  |L1.4164|

                  |L1.4196|

;;;643    						else

;;;649    								bkp_flash_reset();	//恢复 bkp 区和擦除 flash 区

;;;650    								lcd_show_character(&pt_word.warring[6]);//"恢复成功"

                  |L1.4272|
;;;651    								
;;;652    							}
;;;653    						}
;;;654    						else
;;;655    						if(holder.contentList[holder.curSelectId-1].inputContent == CONTENT_DATA)//日期输入
0010b0  4859              LDR      r0,|L1.4632|
0010b2  6881              LDR      r1,[r0,#8]  ; holder
0010b4  7b00              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0xc]  ; holder

;;;656    						{
;;;657    							input_data(cmsg->value);

0011b0  4818              LDR      r0,|L1.4628|
0011b2  6a00              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x20]  ; pt_word
0011b4  f8d02138          LDR      r2,[r0,#0x138]
0011b8  ca07              LDM      r2,{r0-r2}
0011ba  ab01              ADD      r3,sp,#4
0011bc  c307              STM      r3!,{r0-r2}
0011be  4815              LDR      r0,|L1.4628|
0011c0  6a00              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x20]  ; pt_word

0011c8  4812              LDR      r0,|L1.4628|

0011cc  f8b03134          LDRH     r3,[r0,#0x134]

0011d2  6a00              LDR      r0,[r0,#0x20]  ; pt_word

0011ee  d10c              BNE      |L1.4618|

0011f2  490a              LDR      r1,|L1.4636|

0011f6  f7fffffe          BL       input_clear
;;;680    						//刷右边栏
;;;681    						LCD_CLEAR_SIDE;//刷屏
0011fa  e000              B        |L1.4606|
                  |L1.4604|
0011fc  e005              B        |L1.4618|
                  |L1.4606|
0011fe  f7fffffe          BL       lcd_clear
;;;682    						content_value_read();

;;;683    						//显示内容
;;;684    						content_creat();

;;;685    					}
;;;686    				}
;;;687    			}

;;;689    			
;;;690    	}
;;;691    	return 0;

;;;692    }
001210  b004              ADD      sp,sp,#0x10
001212  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;693

                  |L1.4632|
